mapper.select: SELECT anon_comment.id, anon_comment.deleted, anon_comment.created_at as createdAt, anon_comment.modified_at as modifiedAt, anon_comment.content FROM anon_comment WHERE anon_comment.id = #{id}
SELECT anon_comment.id, anon_comment.modified_at as modifiedAt, anon_comment.content FROM anon_comment JOIN anon_post ON anon_post.id = anon_comment.post_id WHERE anon_comment.id is not NULL
